thread.title: Small businesses face extortionate rates rises
thread.title_full: Small businesses face extortionate rates rises

title: Small businesses face extortionate rates rises
text: Madness of new business rates: 500,000 small businesses, pubs, GPs' surgeries schools, colleges face extortionate rises while, guess what, internet bosses will be better off Thousands of small businesses are to be hammered by a rise in business rates They will pay thousands of pounds a year more under the ‘scandalous’ review But in a sign of the growing madness of the new system, several major online firms such as Amazon and Sports Direct will actually benefit from a tax cut New figures suggest the Treasury will rake in more than £1billion extra next year Published: 22:16 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 22:24 GMT, 15 February 2017 5 shares
